QuestData.Title: Trouble at Fort Daelin
QuestData.Description:
I was sent to Brennadam by my commanding officer to find a tidesage to help us at Fort Daelin to the west. The naga have started another attack on the bastion, and it's larger than any we have seen.
Lieutenant Bauer is in the middle of helping out civilians at the village near the fort, and she could use any help possible.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Lieutenant Bauer at Seabreeze Village.
QuestData.RewardText: These fishermen are no pushovers themselves. They should be able to hold their own here with a little help.
